name: The Note (1997)
description: The Note (公開されなかった手記, Koukai Sarena Katta Shuki: The Note) is a first-person survival horror adventure game developed by Team Bughouse and published by SunSoft for the Sony PlayStation. It was released in Japan on January 17, 1997; and in Europe on October 1 of the same year. The game did not see a North American release. It is perhaps one of the least known games on the platform, as a result of its limited release.
